paper_abstract: Many science domains need to build computationally efficient and accurate representations of high-fidelity, computationally expensive simulations known as reduced-order models (ROMs). The Reveal toolset generates ROMs based on science- and engineering-domain-specific simulations executed on high-performance computing (HPC) platforms. This article describes the Reveal architecture and demonstrates its use.
paper_title: Reveal: An Extensible Reduced-Order Model Builder for Simulation and Modeling
